mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE_BASCKET ( PC_NO, MEMBER_NO, SB_NO, PC_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_PC_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{sbNo}, #{pcAmount} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.PC_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.PC_AMOUNT, A.SB_NO, B.SB_NAME, B.SB_PRICE FROM PURCHASE_BASCKET A LEFT OUTER JOIN SHOPPINGBASCKET B ON A.SB_NO = B.SB_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT * FROM PURCHASE_BASCKET WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and #{sbNo}
